text:
When I create a tar archive using the tar task on Win2K and then try to extract
the archive on Slackware 10.0 (GNU tar 1.14), I get some error messages "Blanks
in header where numeric time_t value expected" and for every archived directory:
"<dirname>: implausibly old time stamp 1969-12-31 23:59:59".
When I create the same tar archive using the tar task on Slackware 10.0, I get
no error messages.
creator: henselin@lar.com

text: I don't think this problem exists anymore - at least not with the Commons Compress code merged into Ant's trunk with svn revision 1350857
creator: bodewig@apache.org
